contentrichtext.text: {{BLP sources|date=October 2008}} '''Tom Gilb''' (1940) is an American [[systems engineer]], consultant, and author, known for the development of [[software metric]], [[software inspection]], and evolutionary processes. == Biography == Tom Gilb was born in 1940 in [[Pasadena, California]], [[USA]]. He emigrated to the [[United Kingdom]] in 1956 and to [[Norway]] in 1958. He took his first job with [[IBM]] in 1958 and became a [[freelance]] consultant in 1960. He is currently{{when|date=November 2011}} a consultant, teacher and author, in partnership with his son Kai Gilb.{{fact|date=November 2011}} He mainly helps multinational clients improve their organizations and methods by using "evolutionary systems delivery" (Evo). He has "guest lectured at universities all over UK, Europe, China, India, USA, Korea â€“ and has been a keynote speaker at dozens of technical conferences internationally".<ref>[http://www.gilb.com About Tom Gilb & Kai Gilb].</ref> He is a member of [[INCOSE]] and is active in the Norwegian chapter, NORSEC, which presented him with an award in 2003.{{fact|date=November 2011}} He lectures at INCOSE local chapters on his worldwide travels and at INCOSE conferences. In 2012 he was made an Honorary Fellow of the [[British Computer Society]].<ref>[http://www.bcs.org/content/conWebDoc/1648 BCS Roll of Honorary Fellows]</ref> == Publications == Gilb has written nine books and several articles. A selection includes: * ''Software Inspection (book)|Software Inspection'', 1993. ISBN 0-201-63181-4. * ''Principles of Software Engineering Management'', 1988. ISBN 0-201-19246-2 (19th printing). * ''[[Competitive Engineering]]: A Handbook for Systems & Software Engineering Management using Planguage'', 2005. ISBN 0-7506-6507-6. (Planguage is a formal, natural language modelling notation invented by Gilb that adds rigour to the requirement documentation.) == References == {{Reflist}} ==External links== * [http://www.gilb.com Gilb's website] * [http://csdl2.computer.org/comp/mags/so/2006/04/s4100.pdf Review of ''Competitive Engineering'' by Stuart James Woodward] {{Authority control|VIAF=37211556}} {{Persondata <!-- Metadata: see [[Wikipedia:Persondata]]. --> | NAME = Gilb, Tom | ALTERNATIVE NAMES = | SHORT DESCRIPTION = Systems engineer, consultant, author | DATE OF BIRTH = 1940 | PLACE OF BIRTH = [[Pasadena, California]], [[USA]] | DATE OF DEATH = | PLACE OF DEATH = }} {{DEFAULTSORT:Gilb, Tom}} [[Category:1940 births]] [[Category:Living people]] [[Category:People from Pasadena, California]] [[Category:American expatriates in Norway]] [[Category:IBM employees]] [[Category:Systems engineers]] [[Category:Software engineers]] [[Category:Computer science writers]] [[Category:American consultants]]
